text: Ti mou stelneis grammata (; ) is an anonymous Cappadocian Greek folk tune (Kasik Havasi or Χορός κουταλιών ). The meter is . There are similar folk tunes known as and . ==Original form== The original form of the song was popular in Cappadocia with Cappadocian Greeks. ==See also== *Music of Greece *Vassilis Tsitsanis ==References== Category:Greek songs Category:Songwriter unknown Category:Year of song unknown
title: Ti mou stelneis grammata
